ygData.subject: RE: white out and specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: So I can buy the rest of the lvl 1 spells and put them on page 50 of my spellbook?  I m glad I asked... thanks. ... From: Vincent Archer
ygData.messageBody:
So I can buy the rest of the lvl 1 spells and put them on page 50 of my
spellbook? I'm glad I asked... thanks.

-----Original Message-----
From: Vincent Archer [mailto:Vincent.Archer@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 9:57 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] white out and specialization


From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

According to Robert Jones:
> I have a question about spell books which I could easily test in game for
a
> small fee, but I never get around to it so I figured I'd see if one of you
> could help (and save my few GP). Let's say I did something stupid (this
> didn't happen) like not buy root at lvl4, and already filled all five
slots
> in my spellbook... can I go out and buy root and scribe it over top of one
> of my lvl4 spells that I think sucks?

Five slots? Which five slots?
You may write any spell at any place in your spellbook. How you organise
it is your prerogative.

Buy the spell, and write it somewhere. You don't (you even can't) erase
other spells. But you can purchase all spells at any level and write them
down.

--
